entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries changing to 60 percent chance of rain showers this morning. Risk of freezing rain early this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 9. Wind chill minus 5 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 3 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of flurries after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 3 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High 9. POP 30%
